items.name: uuid_v4
items.doc:
simplex-uuid - UUID generation for Simplex

Generates UUIDs following RFC 4122 standard.

# Example
...

items.name: uuid_nil
items.doc:
Generate a nil UUID (all zeros)
Returns: "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"

items.name: uuid_is_nil
items.doc: Check if a UUID is nil (all zeros)

items.name: uuid_is_valid
items.doc:
Validate UUID format
Returns true if uuid matches: xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx

items.name: uuid_new
items.doc: Generate a new random UUID (alias for uuid_v4)
